articles.description: The League One leaders have an away game against Cheltenham Town at Whaddon Road on Boxing Day afternoon
articles.content:
Plymouth Argyle's players are spending most of their Christmas Day with family and friends up and down the country ahead of the away League One game against Cheltenham Town tomorrow (3pm).

articles.author: Sam Jess, John Evely
articles.title: Bath Rugby rugby player ratings from narrow Exeter Chiefs defeat - 'Hugely influential' - Somerset Live
articles.description: Bath Rugby were beaten 20-15 by Exeter Chiefs at Sandy Park in Round 13 of the 2022/23 Gallagher Premiership
articles.content:
In wet conditions at Sandy Park, Exeter Chiefs showed grit to hang on against a frustrated Bath Rugby side, winning 20-15 on Christmas Eve.
